wf_workflow_version.name: Idea Request Filter
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_activity.name: Analyst determines if idea is actionable

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

activity.display_value: Analyst determines if idea is actionable
Analyst determines if idea is actionable

wf_activity.name: Analyst determines if idea is evaluatable

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

activity.display_value: Analyst determines if idea is evaluatable

wf_activity.name: Close idea if no response within 30 days

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;

activity.display_value: Close idea if no response within 30 days

wf_activity.name: Instructs submitter to make changes within 30 days

sys_variable_value.value: ${opened_by}, We believe this is an actionable idea but we need more information .....
We like your idea be need more information
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
We like your idea be need more information
${opened_by}, We believe this is an actionable idea but we need more information .....
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Instructs submitter to make changes within 30 days

sys_variable_value.value: state=5^work_notes=Request for more information > 30 days. Marking idea "Incomplete"^EQ
state=5^work_notes=Request for more information > 30 days. Marking idea "Incomplete"^EQ

wf_activity.name: Wait for acceptance of updated idea

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;

activity.display_value: Wait for acceptance of updated idea

from.display_value: Analyst determines if idea is evaluatable
Analyst determines if idea is actionable

to.display_value: Instructs submitter to make changes within 30 days

from.display_value: Instructs submitter to make changes within 30 days

to.display_value: Close idea if no response within 30 days
Analyst determines if idea is actionable
